name: Les Joyaux Célestes
description:
Synopsis :

The lava god gave a gift to the human. A gift of power. But they were vain....

They died burning in the wrath of the lava god.

Walk through the ruins of a god's despair.

-------------------------------------

The game is in english.

Consider it is a prototype. I tried a few mechanics. 

The core mechanic of the game is forgiveness.

Inputs :

Hold down right mouse button to make a sound and interact

Use wasd or zqsd to move

Press [E] to interact
